isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER AUTOMATE-2 - TROUBLESHOOTING (ELECTRICAL) - CONFIRMING PROPER OPERATION OF J1922 CONTROL LINK

svcproc.title: CONFIRMING PROPER OPERATION OF J1922 CONTROL LINK
svcproc.para: Inspect the Controller to Vehicle Wiring Harness (J4 pins 11 and 18) for short and open circuits. Refer to the Controller to vehicle wiring diagram. It is sometimes helpful to disconnect each node (controller) one at a time to isolate a controller or data link problem.
If short or open circuits are found, repair or replace the HARNESS as necessary.
If no short or open circuits are found and the Harness appears to be in working condition, verify that other components using the J1922 Control Link are not causing Control Link failure.
